## setInUnsafe variable

Unchecked version of .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setInUnsafe: <T>(state: any, path: Path, val: T) => any
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` can be used to indicate the type of the nested value to be set (default: `any`<!-- -->).

## Example


```ts
setInUnsafe({}, "a.b.c", 23);
// { a: { b: { c: 23} } }

```
